18625.「なんだか イムイ地下空洞へ\n 呼ばれている気がするの……。\n ボクたち 後:
I feel like I'm being called to the Imui
Underground Cave... We'll be following you.

18626.「その洞くつ たぶん ボクと博士さんが\n はじめて会った 洞くつだよ……。:
I think that's the cave where Dr. Bishop and I
first met.

18627.「北へ行って カミハルムイ領北に着いたら\n ずっと 北に行ったところにある\n:
Go north and when you get to Kamiharmui Area
North, I think it's the Imui Underground Cave,
way to the north. Yo...regards.

18646.「ここから東 夢幻の森に着いたら\n ずっと東に進めば 捨てられた城があるわ！\:
East of here, once you reach the Dream Forest, keep going east and you'll find the Abandoned Castle! Behind it, in the garden, there's a
fountain that leads to the Holy Land!

18647.「お前たちの意志 強い。\n われらも お前たちを信じる。: Your will is strong. We believe in you.

18648.「われらは 先に 暗黒大樹に戻っている。: We have already returned to the Dark Tree.

18685.「ありがとね <pc>。\n あなたのおかげで ここまで来れたわ。:
Thanks <pc>. You've helped me get
this far.

18686.「感じるわ。聖地のチカラを……。\n このチカラを 体内に宿せば……。:
I can feel it. The power of the sanctuary...
if I let this power inside me...

18690.「聖地のチカラを宿した 今のハッパなら\n 魔瘴を 消滅させることができるはずよ:
With the power of the Holy Land in him, this Happa should be able to destroy the demon miasma. And the demon miasma that covers the
core of the Dark Tree.

18691.「あとは ハッパが\n 濃い魔瘴に 耐えられるかどうか……。:
Now we just have to see if Happa can withstand
the thick demon miasma...

18700.「<cs_pchero>！ あいつを倒さないと\n 芯に 近づくことができないわ:
<cs_pchero>! We need to take that guy down
so we can get closer to the core!

18701.「魔物の討伐！ あなたに まかせるわ！:
We'll take down the monsters! You're in
charge!

18708.「ナイス <cs_pchero>！\n やっぱり あなたは頼りになるね！:
Nice <cs_pchero>! I knew I could count on
you!

18710.「次は ハッパの番だね。\n 準備はいい？: Now it's Happa's turn. Are you ready?

18713.「えへへ。ちゃんと 呼べたじゃん。\n どしたの？:
Hehehe. You could have called me. What
happened?

18714.「ハネツキお姉ちゃん……。\n もしも 戻れなかったら ごめんね。:
Hanetsuki sis I'm sorry if I couldn't make it
back.

18715.「今まで ありがと……。\n ボク いってくるね。: Thanks for everything... I'll be back later.

18716.「うん。ここで 待ってるから。\n いってらっしゃい。:
I'll wait for you here. I'll wait for you
here. See you later.

18719.「ううううう……。く…苦しい……。\n た…耐えなきゃ 耐えるんだ……。:
Uggghhh...suffering...I have to endure...I
have to endure...

18720.「ハァハァ……。つ…着いた。\n ここが 大樹の芯……。\n せ…聖地のチカラを:
I'm here.... This is the core of the big
tree... we must use the power of the sacred
place...

18721.「ううう……。ダ…ダメだ。\n もう か…身体が もた…な…い……。:
Ugh... da... it's no good. My body... can't...
take... it... anymore...

18724.「あ…あれ？\n 身体が なんともない。: Ah...what is it? My body feels fine.

18725.「全然 苦しくないぞ……。\n よ…よーし！: It's not painful at all... y... y... yes!

18726.「奇跡……。奇跡 起きた……。\n ハッパ エルフなのに\n 魔瘴の耐性に 目覚:
A miracle... a miracle... Happa, an Elf,
waking up resistant to demon miasma...

18728.「へへっ やるじゃん。\n 最高に かっこよかったよ。:
Heh, heh, heh. You're good at it. That was the
coolest thing I've ever seen.

18730.「<cs_pchero>さんと 一緒に\n いろんな経験が できたから\n ボク:
I think I became strong because I had many
experiences with <cs_pchero>.

18731.「今まで ありがとね……。\n こ…これ 受け取って。:
Thank you for everything you've done for me...
here... take this.

18732.「世界樹に 危機 訪れし時\n 世界樹を救うため 世に現れる存在……。\n ハッ:
When a crisis comes to Yggdrasil, a being
appears in the world to save it... Happa,
perhaps...

18736.「それで 聖地と暗黒大樹を往復して\n これからも 大樹に現れた魔瘴を消していく:
So, I will continue to go back and forth between the sacred place and the Dark Tree to eliminate the miasma that appears in the tree.
I will protect the tree.

18737.「えへへ かっこいいじゃん。\n なんか あれだね。:
Hehehe, he's so cool. It's something like
that.

18738.「暗黒大樹の守り人って 感じだね。:
It's kind of like being a Great Dark Tree
Guardian.

29900.「あっ！ 待ってたよ！\n ねぇねぇ 知ってる！？:
Ah! I've been waiting for you! Hey, hey, you
know what?

29901.「博士さんがね 魔瘴を消す方法を\n 突き止めたんだよ！:
Dr. K., I think I've figured out how to get
rid of demon miasma!

29902.「でも 博士さんね ずっと暗い顔してるんだ。\n なんでかなあ？:
But you look so gloomy all the time. I wonder
why?

29903.「あっ。ご…ごめんなさい。\n 勝手に しゃべっちゃって。: Ah. I'm sorry. I spoke without permission.

29904.「あ…あのね。ボク ちょっと\n 出かけたいんだけど よかったら\n 一緒に 行:
Um...you know. I'd like to go out for a bit,
but I was wondering if you'd go with me?

29905.「カミハルムイ領北の イムイ地下空洞なんだけど\n ど…どう？ お願いできる？:
Imui Underground Cave, Kamiharmui Area
North. Can you help me?

29906.「あ…ありがと。ボク なんだか\n その場所から 呼ばれてる気がするんだ。\n:
Thanks. I feel like I'm being called from that
place. Well then...

29907.「ちょっと待って ハッパ。\n イムイ地下空洞に 行くの？:
Wait a minute, Happa. Are we going to the Imui
Underground Cave?

29908.「あ……。うん。\n すぐに 戻ってくるよ。: Uh... yeah. I'll be right back.

29910.「最近 研究 研究で\n ずっと 引きこもってたから\n ちょっと 気晴らしにね:
I've been cooped up a lot lately with research
and studies, so I thought I'd take a break.

29912.「それじゃあ ボクたち 後から ついていくね。\n その洞くつ ボクと博士さんが:
Well then, we'll be right behind you. That's
the cave where I and the doctor first met.

29913.「北へ行って カミハルムイ領北に着いたら\n さらに 北に行ったところにある\n:
Go north, and when you get to Kamiharmui
North, it's a cave further north. Yo...nice to
meet you.

29914.「あ…ありがと。でも なんか\n 他の人たちの頼まれごとで いっぱいだね。\n:
Thanks. But you seem to be full of other
people's requests. I'm not in a hurry, so you
can go first.

29915.「そ…そうだよね。ごめんなさい。\n 変なこと 頼んだりして……。:
So...yes, you're right. I'm sorry. I didn't
mean to ask you to do anything weird.

29916.「で…でも ボクだけじゃ不安だし\n どうすればいいんだろ……。: But... but I don't know what to do.

29917.「よく来た 勇気ある者。\n ハッパと賢い者も 来たな。:
Welcome, brave one. Happa and the wise one
have come too.

29918.「魔瘴が 外に もれている……。\n このままじゃ 王都は……。:
Demon miasma is leaking out... and if it
doesn't, Royal City will...

29919.「エルフの城 魔瘴により滅ぶ。\n 大樹周辺 濃い魔瘴に覆われる。\n この大陸:
Elf castle is destroyed by miasma. The area around the tree is covered in thick miasma. There is no place for Happa to return to on
this continent.

29920.「勇気ある者と 賢い者よ。\n ハッパとともに ほかの大陸に逃げてくれ。:
Courageous and wise, flee with the weed to
another continent. Flee with Happa to another
continent.

29922.「博士さんが 魔瘴を消す方法を\n 突き止めてくれたんだ。:
Dr. K. has figured out how to get rid of the
demon miasma.

29923.「暗黒大樹の芯を覆う 魔瘴を消せば\n 魔瘴を取り込むチカラが 回復するでしょ？:
If we eliminate the miasma that covers the
core of the Dark Tree, it will regain its
ability to take in miasma?

29924.「そうなれば 暗黒大樹が\n 魔瘴を浄化してくれるから\n エルトナ大陸を 守れ:
Then the Dark Tree will purify the demon
miasma and we can protect Eltona Continent.

29925.「……ムリよ。魔瘴を消す方法は\n わかったけど それは 実現不可能なの。:
I can't do it. I've figured out how to get rid
of the demon miasma, but it's not feasible.

29927.「捨てられた城の裏手にある 王家の庭の泉が\n 聖地につながっていて そこに魔瘴:
The fountain in the Royal Garden, behind the Abandoned Castle, leads to a sacred place where the holy power of the counterpart to
demon miasma lies.

29928.「そのチカラを 体内に宿し\n 魔力とともに放てば 魔瘴を\n 消滅させることが:
If we could release the power of the demon
miasma into our bodies, we would be able to
eliminate the demon miasma...

29929.「そのためには 魔瘴に入る必要がある。\n エルフでは 魔瘴に耐えられないわ。:
To do that, we need to enter the demon miasma.
Elf can't withstand the demon miasma.

29930.「われらなら 魔瘴に耐えられるが\n 聖なるチカラには 耐えられない。\n われ:
We can withstand demon miasma, but we cannot
withstand holy power. Even we can't.

29931.「つまり……魔瘴の消滅は 誰にもできないのよ。\n 期待させちゃって ごめんね。:
I mean... no one can make the demon miasma
disappear. Sorry for getting your hopes up.

29935.「……み みんな 知ってるでしょ？\n ボク ずっと暗黒大樹で育ったから\n 魔:
You all know that, don't you? I grew up in the
Dark Tree all my life, so I can withstand
demon miasma.

29936.「ちょ…ちょっと 気持ちわるくなるけどね。\n えへへ……。:
It makes me a little uncomfortable, though.
Hehehe...

29937.「……ハッパ ダメよ。\n 今まで だまってたけど\n それって 生命力が失われ:
Happa, no. You've been quiet about it, but
that's a sign that it's losing its life force.

29938.「続ければ 死期を近づけるわ。\n しかも 暗黒大樹の芯を覆っているのは\n と:
If you continue, it will bring you closer to death. Moreover, the core of the Dark Tree is covered with a very thick demon miasma. You
can't withstand it.

29939.「でも このままじゃ エルトナ大陸の全部が\n 魔瘴だらけになっちゃう！\n み:
But if we don't do something, the whole of Eltona Continent will be covered in demon miasma! I don't want everyone to have no home
to go back to!

29940.「ボク やっとわかったんだ。\n なんのために 生まれてきたのか。: I finally understand. What I was born for.

29941.「エルフなのに 魔瘴に耐えられる この身体。\n イヤだったけど 今は 誇りに思:
This body can withstand demon miasma despite
being an Elf. I didn't like it, but now I'm
proud of it.

29942.「これは ボクにしかできないんだ。\n ボクが魔瘴を消して みんなを守るよ。:
I'm the only one who can do this. I'll
eliminate the demon miasma and protect
everyone.

29943.「自然の意志に 逆らうか……。\n ハッパの意志 とても強い。:
Do we go against the will of nature... or the
will of Happa? Very strong.

29944.「やれやれ。言うようになったじゃない。\n どうやら 止めても ムダみたいね……:
Good grief. Now you're talking. Looks like
there's nothing I can do to stop you...

29945.「仕方ない。ひとつだけ アドバイスしとくわ。:
It can't be helped. I'll give you one piece of
advice.

29946.「……おのれの生命力を削り 魔瘴に対する耐性を\n 限界まで引き上げれば ほんの:
...If you reduce your Force Room and raise your resistance to Force Room to the limit, you may be able to withstand the thicker demon
miasma for just a little while.

29947.「でも これは賭けだわ……。\n 耐えられなかったら 確実に…死ぬわよ。\n ハ:
But it's a gamble... and if you can't take it,
you'll certainly... die. Happa. You're okay
with that, aren't you?

29948.「うん。ボク やるよ！: I'll do it! I'll do it!

29950.「そこまで 命をかけてんなら\n あたしも 最後まで見届けるわ！:
If you're going to put your life on the line
like that, I'll see it through to the end!

29951.「ハッパ！ 行くわよ！\n まずは 聖地！\n 聖なるチカラを 宿しにいくわ！:
Happa! Let's go! First, the sacred ground!
We're going to the sacred land of the Holy
Ghost!

29953.「<pc>！ あなたも 協力して！\n 聖地までの護衛を お願い！\n あたした:
<pc>! I need your help! I need you to
escort me to the sanctuary! We'll be right
behind you!

29954.「ここから東 夢幻の森に着いたら\n ずっと東に進めば 捨てられた城があるわ！\:
East of here, once you reach the Dream Forest, keep going east and you'll find the Abandoned Castle! Behind it, in the garden, there's a
fountain that leads to the Holy Land!

29955.「お前たちの意志 強い。\n われらも お前たちを信じる。: Your will is strong. We believe in you.

29956.「われらは 先に 暗黒大樹に戻っている。: We have already returned to the Dark Tree.

29957.「<pc>！ あなたも 協力して！\n 聖地までの護衛を お願い！\n あたした:
<pc>! I need your help! I need you to
escort me to the sanctuary! We'll be right
behind you!

29958.「ハッパ？ 準備はいい？\n 目をつぶって 精神を集中させるのよ。:
Happa? Ready? Close your eyes and focus your
mind.

29962.「身体が あったかい。\n 身体の中に 小さな光が入ったみたい。:
My body is warm. It is as if a small light
entered my body.

29963.「上出来よ。その光を 魔力で放てば\n 魔瘴を 消滅させることができるはずだわ。:
Good work. If we can make that light glow with
magic, we should be able to kill the demon
miasma.

29964.「あとは 実践あるのみね。\n 暗黒大樹に 向かいましょう。:
Now all we have to do is practice. Let's head
for the Dark Tree.

29966.「もし 前みたいに 魔瘴から魔物が現れたら\n あたしたちじゃ 太刀打ちできない:
If a demon miasma appears like before, we won't be able to compete with it. . You should come to Dark Tree
too.

29967.「われら ハッパのチカラを信じる。\n お前の意志 見せてみろ。:
We believe in the power of Happa. Show us your
will.

29970.「<cs_pchero>！ 魔物が出るわよ！\n あなたに まかせるわ！:
<cs_pchero>! There's a monster out there!
I'll leave it to you!
